author: Kimberly Dozier
title: China Wins: Why Trump’s WHO Funding Cut is a Gift to Beijing
description: When he accused the World Health Organization (WHO) on Tuesday of going soft on China over the COVID-19 pandemic and suspended U.S. payments to the agency, President Donald Trump put the strategic question of the century on the table. What’s the best way to w…
